forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 62. West southwest wind 14 to 22 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 54. West southwest wind 13 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

weather_report:
As the afternoon sun lingers over Downtown San Francisco, the scene presents itself in a mostly sunny disposition. With temperatures hovering around a mild sixty-two, there’s a gentle push of west-southwest winds stirring at fourteen to twenty-two miles per hour, creating captivating whispers of movement in the air. However, you may also notice a subtle haze—an indication of the omnipresent marine layer hovering nearby, rendering visibility slightly murky as it mingles with the outlines of the Golden Gate Bridge and the urban landscape.

As we slip into the evening, the clouds will gradually thicken, enfolding the city in their embrace and dropping the temperature to a cozy fifty-four. The winds will continue to play a soft song through the streets, creating a refreshing backdrop to the evening’s calm. Dressing in layers is your best approach; a light jacket will shield against the coolness that sweeps in with the night, while a comfortable shirt beneath will keep you snug as the sun dips beneath the horizon.

Given these conditions, a leisurely stroll along the Embarcadero could be a lovely way to savor the day, perhaps winding your way to a quaint café for warming sips or seeking out a spot where the lingering hints of sunshine meet the first blush of evening. Whether exploring local boutiques or simply enjoying the breeze, today offers a backdrop that's both relaxed and inviting.
